suite.doc: Certificate level II, Simo Pärnänen (using Python). Saves the order HTML receipt as a PDF file. Saves the screenshot of the ordered robot. Embeds the screenshot of the robot to the PDF receipt. Creates ZIP archive of the receipts and the images.
